string.value: After handing #p9120011# the doll, #b#t04000148#k also disappeared! #b#p9120011##k said she'll tell me a story...
#p9120011# suggested that I go to where #b#p1012109##k is and look for it. That's true, since standing pat doesn't do anything for me. I better go back and discuss this with him.

Apparently, #t04000148# and #t04000147# were both moved by warmth and compassion #p9120011# exudes. Isn't that nice to see? Just the way #p1012109# said, if everyone genuinely loves everything around them, then there would be no monster to begin with...? Anyway, it was nice to hear that #p1012109# may be ready to write the next chapter in the book. I'm can't wait~!
What? My doll is back, but... you must be going through something terrible, no?
The light engulfed #b#t04000148##k in the process? I'm sorry... is it my fault ...?
Did you gather them up through the request of #b#p1012109##k? If so, then why don't you consult #b#p1012109##k about this?
If you ever get to meet #b#p1012109##k, I wish you could Say thanks on behalf of me...
How as it? Did you find #b#t04000148##k and #b#t04000147##k?
I see... maybe #b#t04000148##k and #b#t04000147##k both felt the sincere warmth #b#p9120011##k brings with her, and may have become free in the process.
Usually those monsters are created when humans cease to have a genuine affectionate feeling towards them. From here on out, I sure hope each and every one of us cherish our surroundings...
#b#t04000148##k may have disappeared, but through this, I finally got to see what I really wanted to know. Now all that is left for me is to write a book on this.
For your continued help, this one's for you. Please use it. I can't thank you enough for your hard work.
